alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 05 at 2:54AM MDT until August 06 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 103 expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to 7 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 7 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
